title: Richard Rush, Fellini, Laugh-In
googleplay:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
itunes:author: viewerswfyi@wfyi.org (WFYI Public Media)
description: Where else but Film Soceyology can you hear a tribute to writer/director Richard Rush (The Stunt Man), an update on Criterion's Fellini box set and the movie stars appearing on Laugh-In? Your pledge dollars at work.
